CHARACTER CREATION - CHECKLIST

The Mechanics Of Character Creation

We follow the guidance of the Players Hand Book pretty closely when creating characters. Here is a checklist of those steps and how to find the changes we have made to the races, classes, etc, for this game setting.

If you are familiar with roll20 then start by requesting a character sheet in the #character-creation channel on discord.

Choice One: Pick A Race

There are some significant changes to the races. Please take a look at the ones that interest you.





Choice Two: Attributes

Please see Attributes - 27 Point Buy
Here is a helpful link.

Choice Three: Class

We have limited class availability but we have not changed the mechanics of the classes much. Our biggest change is to the Hexblade warlock, taking away the ability to use Charisma to hit and damage with weapons if they multiclass.

Classes and Sublcasses

Choice Four: Personality And Background

We make significant changes to backgrounds only. Please go here.

Choice Five: Equipment

The background section goes over all of your equipment options. We simply want to call out that there is no starting equipment normally found in the Player's Handbook. You start off quite poor.

And Finally: Registering Your Character

If you didn't start the process by creating the character in Roll20 then now is the time to do so. In the discord server ask for a character sheet in #character-creation.
